ISSUE.TITLE: default some columns to utf8mb4
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: We often see mysql databases created with the latin1 character set which fail to handle certain languages and special character sequences like emojis. Instead of relying on this to be configure correctly, we should probably just force a subset of drone fields to use the correct character set. We should probably set a default for the commit title and message, at a minimum. ```sql build_message VARCHAR(2000) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_ci ```
